A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Many problems in the narrative. Many moments of incoherence. What a way to waste an interesting villain like snoke. Finn and Rose\, forgettable characters. Poe is a sea of inconsistencies. The casino scene\, a failure. The character of Benicio del Toro\, forgettable. Phasma\, again forgettable. It is a copy of the empire but strikes back but poorly executed (as was episode VII of the IV). What a disappointment for the fans. The only thing that rescues the film is Mark Hamill and his interpretation. Disney has a very difficult job to close this trilogy with dignity.
